Header.Author: TK Conrad
Header.Title: Facility ID - Facility Index Sample Instance Document
Header.Comment:
This is a sample instance document which provides an example exchange of information using the Facility Count component of the Facility ID schema. This component contains a single element, FacilityCountMeasure, used to support the GetFacilityCount_v3.0 data service.
This is a sample instance document is for educational purposes only. Information found in this document will not reflect actual information for existing facilities. All information was fabricated for the purposes of this example.
Header.ContactInfo: 4000 Kruse Way Place, Blg 2, Ste 285, Lake Oswego, OR, 97035, 503-675-7833, tk_conrad@windsorsolutions.com
